ns0:entry.ns0:title: 89luca89/distrobox
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/89luca89/distrobox
Language: shell
Use any linux distribution inside your terminal. Enable both backward and forward compatibility with software and freedom to use whatever distribution you’re more comfortable with. Mirror available at: https://gitlab.com/89luca89/distrobox

ns0:entry.ns0:title: DaoCloud/public-image-mirror
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/DaoCloud/public-image-mirror
Language: shell
很多镜像都在国外。比如 gcr 。国内下载很慢，需要加速。致力于提供连接全世界的稳定可靠安全的容器镜像服务。

ns0:entry.ns0:title: HariSekhon/DevOps-Bash-tools
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/HariSekhon/DevOps-Bash-tools
Language: shell
1000+ DevOps Bash Scripts - AWS, GCP, Kubernetes, Docker, CI/CD, APIs, SQL, PostgreSQL, MySQL, Hive, Impala, Kafka, Hadoop, Jenkins, GitHub, GitLab, BitBucket, Azure DevOps, TeamCity, Spotify, MP3, LDAP, Code/Build Linting, pkg mgmt for Linux, Mac, Python, Perl, Ruby, NodeJS, Golang, Advanced dotfiles: .bashrc, .vimrc, .gitconfig, .screenrc, tmux..

ns0:entry.ns0:title: MichaelCade/90DaysOfDevOps
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/MichaelCade/90DaysOfDevOps
Language: shell
This repository started out as a learning in public project for myself and has now become a structured learning map for many in the community. We have 3 years under our belt covering all things DevOps, including Principles, Processes, Tooling and Use Cases surrounding this vast topic.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: Steam-Headless/docker-steam-headless
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/Steam-Headless/docker-steam-headless
Language: shell
A Headless Steam Docker image supporting NVIDIA GPU and accessible via Web UI

ns0:entry.ns0:title: itzg/docker-minecraft-server
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/itzg/docker-minecraft-server
Language: shell
Docker image that provides a Minecraft Server for Java Edition that automatically downloads selected version at startup

ns0:entry.ns0:title: nvm-sh/nvm
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/nvm-sh/nvm
Language: shell
Node Version Manager - POSIX-compliant bash script to manage multiple active node.js versions

ns0:entry.ns0:title: ohmyzsh/ohmyzsh
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/ohmyzsh/ohmyzsh
Language: shell
🙃 A delightful community-driven (with 2,400+ contributors) framework for managing your zsh configuration. Includes 300+ optional plugins (rails, git, macOS, hub, docker, homebrew, node, php, python, etc), 140+ themes to spice up your morning, and an auto-update tool that makes it easy to keep up with the latest updates from the community.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: pflyly/eden-nightly
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/pflyly/eden-nightly
Language: shell
Unofficial nightly release of Eden Emulator. This repository is not affiliated with the official Eden development team. It exists solely to provide an easy way for users to try out the latest features from recent commits.

The next generation Linux workstation, designed for reliability, performance, and sustainability.
